name: Promotion Class: Earthkeeper
description:
Role: Healing

With a single-minded focus of healing and resource regeneration, the chosen of Gaea are welcomed by all.

Stat Adjustments:
Critical Heal Chance +6%
Support Power +525
Final Mitigations +10%

Traits Granted:
Mystical Staff Proficiency
Mail Armor Proficiency
Mystical Staff Mastery
Life Power Tray

Enhancements:
Blight: Now also heals any friendlies in the radius and has a chance to spawn Healing Orbs for each ally healed.
Bark Skin: Now has a self heal when cast, plus heals if the Barrier is broken.
Grasping Roots: Now spawns Healing Orbs for every enemy hit.

New Mechanic:
Essence Burn: Life Powers will generate Essence when used. If your Essence fills over 80% you will gain Essence Burn, causing you to take damage each second until you die or reduce your Essence under 80%.
Using powers in the Death Powers Tray will reduce your Essence.


WARNING: Purchasing this talent promotes you to the Earthkeeper promotion class and prevents access to the Archdruid and Stormcaller promotion classes.
